title: Spotify logo font
content:
Hello all,

this might be custom, but hoping to find the font used in the Spotify logo below.

Thanks in advance,

Seb

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415212715im_/http:/typophile.com/files/spotify_5693.png)
author: all about seb

comments.content:
It have been drawn by hand, except from the inner of "p", lower corner of "t" and base of the "S". I think we used Glypha actually (in 2006). Attaching a wireframe of the current version.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415212715im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture3_4833.png)
Thanks Rasmus! I'm glad to hear I wasn't too far off.
